text: (Napiye! Ivvetattai avarkal carivarak ketpatillai ena nir cataintu) umakku vahyi mulam arivikkappattavarril cilavarrai vittu vituviro? ‘‘Umakku oru pokkisam arulappata ventama? Allatu um'mutan oru vanavar varaventama?'' Enru avarkal kuruvatu umatu ullattil varuttattai untu pannalam. (Atu parri nir kavalaippata ventam.) Niccayamaka nir (avarkalukku) accamutti eccarikkinra oru tutartan. Allahtan anaittaiyum nirvakippavan
